title: USDC Stablecoin Momentarily Depegs to $0.74 on Binance
description: Circle's USDC stablecoin spiked down to as low as $0.74 on three occasions today following a marketwide sell-off spurred by a report casting doubt over whether a spot bitcoin ETF will be approved this month.

description:

title: Bitcoin NFTs hits $880M in sales in December, surpassing Ethereum and Solana combined
description: Bitcoin has surpassed Ethereum, Solana, and Polygon, becoming the number one chain in NFT sales.

title: Greekslive: Spot Bitcoin ETF approval unlikely until 2nd week of January
description: Options trading analysts pointed to Jan. 10 and beyond as the timeline for an SEC decision on spot Bitcoin ETFs amid bearish speculation that all applications may be rejected.

title: RNDR Declines as Foundation Covers Token Upgrade Costs
description:
In a move to incentivize token migration, the Render Foundation has announced that it will cover gas fees for holders of the RNDR token who choose to upgrade to the new RENDER token on the Solana blockchain. This follows the network’s successful migration from Ethereum to Solana in November 2023. In an announcement blog post, […]
